FuncDef: The display bgp flow ipv6 update-peer-group command is used to view information about the update peer-group of a specified index in the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family.
CLIs: display bgp flow ipv6 update-peer-group [ index <update-group-index> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an update peer-group.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp flow ipv6 update-peer-group index 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display bgp flow ipv6 update-peer-group command is used to view information about the update peer-group of a specified index in the BGP-Flow IPv6 address family.
